en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
ny:
Lowani nawo mazana ofufuza ochokera kuzungulira
           dziko omwe ali mbali ya gulu la Open Specy ndi
           kusanthula, kugawana, kukonza, ndi kuzindikira
           mawonekedwe awo a Raman ndi IR. Ntchitozi ndi zaulere komanso zotseguka kwa anzathu:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
ny:
Mwachidule: Kuti mugwiritse ntchito chidacho kwezani fayilo ya csv, asp, jdx, spc, kapena spa pa tabu yamafayilo okweza.
                                  Ngati csv, gawo limodzi liyenera kutchedwa 'wavenumber' (mumayunitsi a 1/cm) ndipo lina litchulidwe 'kulimba'.
                                  Mutha kusalaza deta yanu pogwiritsa ntchito fyuluta ya SG, konzani zoyambira zanu pogwiritsa ntchito dongosolo la polynomial la iModPolyFit, ndikuchepetsa kutalika kwa mawonekedwe amasewerawo.
                                  Zotsatira zake zidzafaniziridwa ndi laibulale yamkati ya Raman kapena FTIR. Masewera amphamvu kwambiri 1000 pamodzi ndi anu
                                  zomwe zidakwezedwa kapena zosinthidwa zidzawonetsedwa pagawo lolumikizana ndi tebulo. Kuti mudziwe zambiri dinani batani pansipa
                                  kapena onerani tsatanetsatane wa malangizo a kanema.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
ny:
Zowonetserako zidatengedwa kuchokera kuzinthu zotsegula
           pa intaneti, zofalitsidwa ndi anzawo, ndi zopereka zamakampani. Mtsogolomu
           spectra zomwe zidakwezedwa ku chida zidzaphatikizidwa muzofotokozera
           library kuti ikhale yabwinoko.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
ny:
Kuti mugawane zowonera kwezani fayilo ku tabu ya fayilo. Ngati mwasankha Gawani kope la mawonekedwe anu lidzatumizidwa ku Community
           Data Warehouse pa Open Science Framework. Kuti muwonjezere metadata yowonjezera,
           lembani minda ya metadata yomwe ilipo ndikudina -Share Data-. The
           fayilo ya spectra yomwe mudayika pamodzi ndi mayankho anu idzakopedwa
           kupita ku -With Metadata- kafoda kakang'ono pa ulalo womwe uli pansipa. Ma data onse amagawana
           License ya Creative Commons Attribution 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
ny:
Magawo onse mu chida ichi amayesedwa kuti atsimikizire izo
           chida chikugwira ntchito bwino momwe ndingathere ndikuzindikira kusakhazikika kwabwino
           magawo oti mugwiritse ntchito. Njira yathu yotsimikizira ikuphatikiza kukonza
           zolemba zobwerezedwa m'malaibulale ofotokozera, kuyang'ana spectra mkati
           metadata yomwe siili mu laibulale yowonera, ndikuwonetsetsa kuti ndiyokhazikika
           magawo amapereka kulondola kwa 80% pamasewera oyamba.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
ny: Zosintha, Zofunsira, ndi Malipoti a Bug

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
ny: Timasunga zosintha zonse pogwiritsa ntchito kuwongolera kwamitundu pama code athu. Zosintha zitha kufunsidwa ndipo cholakwika chinanenedwa pa GitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
ny: Tsatirani ife pa Twitter @OpenSpecy. Imelo wincowger@gmail.com kuti muwonjezedwe pamndandanda wamakalata.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
ny: Pulogalamu yaulere ya FTIR: pulogalamu yodziwika bwino ya microplastic IR spectral

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
ny: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy kuchokera ku ThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
ny: Chidziwitso chaulere cha Optical Microscopy Learning kuchokera ku Florida State University

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
ny: Ntchito yaulere yapakompyuta yowunikira ma spectral ndi maulalo azosungirako.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
ny:
Ngati mukufuna, timagawana zowonera zanu ndi zokonda zanu ndi gulu la spectroscopy.
           Mwachisawawa, deta yonse idzapatsidwa chilolezo pansi pa Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommerce 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Makanema omwe adakwezedwa adzawonekera apa: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
ny:
Kwezani mafayilo amtundu wa Raman kapena FTIR ngati csv, jdx, spc, kapena spa. Fayilo ya csv ndiyokondedwa. Ngati ndi csv, fayiloyo iyenera kukhala ndi gawo limodzi lolembedwa kuti 'wavenumber' mu mayunitsi a (1/cm) ndi gawo lina lolembedwa 'kulimba' mu mayunitsi oyamwitsa.
            Ngati jdx, spc, spa, kapena 0 fayiloyo ikuyenera kukhala sipekitiramu imodzi yokhala ndi ma wavenumber mu (1/cm). Mafayilowa sangagwire ntchito mwangwiro nthawi zonse chifukwa ndizovuta kuwerenga kotero kuti muwafufuze mu pulogalamu ina.
            Dinani batani la 'Test Data' kuti mutsitse mawonekedwe a Raman.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
ny:
Ngati sipekitiramu yomwe idakwezedwayo ilibe mayunitsi akumwa,
           gwiritsani ntchito mawuwa kuti mutchule mayunitsi oti musinthe kuchokera.Open Specy can
           sinthani chiwonetsero kapena ma transmittance spectra ku mayunitsi a Absorbance pogwiritsa ntchito
           izi dontho pansi pa kukweza wapamwamba tabu. Ma tabo onse am'mbuyomu
           ganizirani kuti deta ili m'mayunitsi a absorbance kotero muyenera kupanga
           kuwongolera musanapitirize ngati pakufunika. Kusintha kwa transmittance
           amagwiritsa ntchito kuwerengera kwa log10 (1/T) komwe sikulondola pa dongosolo
           ndi mawonekedwe a particle. Kusintha kwa reflectance kumagwiritsa ntchito
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). Timaganiza kuti chiwonetserocho
           imapangidwa ngati peresenti kuchokera ku 1-100 ndipo choyamba ikonza mphamvuyo pogawa ndi 100
           kotero kuti igwirizane ndi mawonekedwe omwe akuyembekezeredwa ndi equation.
           Ngati palibe yosankhidwa, Open Specy imaganiza kuti zomwe zidakwezedwa ndi
           spectrum absorbance.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
ny: Ichi ndi chitsanzo cha sipekitiramu chomwe chingatsitsidwe ku chida choyesera ndikumvetsetsa momwe mafayilo a csv ayenera kusinthidwa.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
ny:
Timagawana zowonera zilizonse zomwe zidakwezedwa ndi metadata ndi gulu lazowonera ngati mudzaza metadata pano ndikusankha kugawana.
           Zithunzi zojambulidwa ndi metadata ziwoneka apa: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
ny: Smooth, Baseline Correct, ndi Download Processed Spectra

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
ny: Ogwiritsa ntchito ena angafune kusunga kopi ya mawonekedwe awo okonzedwa. Batani ili likutsitsa mawonekedwe okonzedwa ngati fayilo ya csv.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
ny: Izi zosalala zimatha kupititsa patsogolo chiŵerengero cha chiŵerengero cha phokoso la deta ndikugwiritsa ntchito fyuluta ya Savitzky-Golay yokhala ndi 12 yothamanga mfundo za data ndi polynomial yotchulidwa.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
ny: Chizoloŵezi chokonzekera choyambirachi chili ndi njira ziwiri zokonzera zoyambira, 1) njira ya polynomial imodpolyfit kuti apeze mozama maziko a sipekitiramu pogwiritsa ntchito polynomial fit kudera lonse la spectra. 2) mizere yamanja ikhoza kujambulidwa pogwiritsa ntchito chida cha mzere pa chiwembucho ndipo batani lolondola lidzagwiritsa ntchito mizereyo kuchotsa zoyambira.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
ny: Kuchepetsa kusiyanasiyana kwa mawonekedwe kumatha kuchotsa madera omwe kulibe nsonga zapamtunda ndikuwongolera kufanana

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
ny: Dziwani Spectrum Pogwiritsa Ntchito Reference Library

en: This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
ny: Kusankhidwaku kudzatsimikizira ngati laibulale yofananira ya FTIR kapena Raman ikugwiritsidwa ntchito. Sankhani mtundu wa sipekitiramu womwe udakwezedwa.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
ny: Kusankhidwa kumeneku kudzatsimikizira ngati sipekitiramu yokwezedwa (yosasinthidwa) kapena sipekitiramu yokonzedwa pogwiritsa ntchito tabu yokonzekera ikugwiritsidwa ntchito pamasewera.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
ny: Kusankhidwa kumeneku kudzatsimikizira ngati laibulale yomwe mukufananitsa ili ndi mawonekedwe athunthu kapena nsonga zamitundu yonse.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
ny: Tithandizeni kukwaniritsa cholinga chathu chosintha mawonekedwe a spectroscopy.

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
ny: Gulu lolipidwa lomwe likukankhira Open Specy kufupi ndi cholinga chachikulu cha 100% chizindikiritso cholondola cha 100% ndi kuwunika kozama kowonekera ndikudina kamodzi.

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
ny: Wogwira ntchito m'modzi wolipidwa akugwira ntchito yokonzanso ndi kumanga dera ndi chida

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
ny: Ndalama zosamalira komanso zosintha zazing'ono za ad-hoc ndi kukonza zolakwika

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
ny: Kusunga pulogalamuyi pa intaneti komanso kukonza kofunikira

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/

Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
ny:
Mtundu wa data wokwezedwa sunagwiritsidwe ntchito pano; Chonde
                      onani zida ndi tabu ya 'About' kuti mumve zambiri.

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
ny:
Ngati mudakweza fayilo ya text/csv, onetsetsani kuti
           mizati ndi manambala ndipo amatchedwa 'wavenumber' ndi
           'mphamvu'.
